name: uniswap-ai-toolkit
description: Uniswap Developer AI Skills - A curated collection of AI-powered development workflows for implementation planning, code review, PR management, and codebase exploration.

plugins.name: implementation-planner
plugins.description: Create actionable implementation plans through multi-agent collaborative refinement. Use when implementing features, adding functionality, refactoring code, or making architectural changes.

plugins.name: plan-executor
plugins.description: Execute implementation plans step-by-step with progress tracking and optional test/doc generation.

plugins.name: plan-reviewer
plugins.description: Critically review implementation plans for completeness, feasibility, and alignment with codebase patterns.

plugins.name: plan-swarm
plugins.description: Collaboratively refine plans through multi-agent discussion and consensus-building.

plugins.name: pr-reviewer
plugins.description: Orchestrate comprehensive pull request review using specialized agents for architecture, security, performance, testing, and maintainability.

plugins.name: pr-creator
plugins.description: Create or update Graphite PRs with auto-generated conventional commit messages and comprehensive descriptions.

plugins.name: pr-issue-resolver
plugins.description: Review GitHub PRs, address review comments, and fix CI/CD failures to make PRs merge-ready.

plugins.name: codebase-explorer
plugins.description: Deep codebase exploration and understanding. Use when asking how something works, understanding architecture, or finding implementations.

plugins.name: code-refactorer
plugins.description: Orchestrate comprehensive code refactoring with architectural analysis, pattern application, and incremental safety checks.

plugins.name: topic-researcher
plugins.description: Research topics by combining web search with codebase analysis for comprehensive understanding.

plugins.name: claude-docs-updater
plugins.description: Intelligently update CLAUDE.md files based on code changes.

plugins.name: tech-debt-analyzer
plugins.description: Identify, quantify, and prioritize technical debt with actionable remediation plans.

plugins.name: prompt-optimizer
plugins.description: Optimize AI prompts for better model performance using prompt engineering techniques.

plugins.name: graphite-stack-updater
plugins.description: Automate Graphite PR stack updates by resolving review comments and syncing all affected PRs.
